MajorClaims.MC1: it is good for a teenager to do a part time job while he/she is still a student
MajorClaims.MC2: part time job will be good for students

Claims.C1: it can destruct students from their study
Claims.C2: students can learn lots of things from part time job, before starting their real job
Claims.C3: from part time jobs students can earn money, which can help their parents

Premises.P1: i did part time job in my high school and it did not hurt my academic result
Premises.P2: Students can learn about time management, money management and convince people by their words
Premises.P3: when I was in my high school I worked as a sales-man in a shop for a year
Premises.P4: i had to manage my time efficiently
Premises.P5: As i had to spend some of my time in my job
Premises.P6: I had to manage my boss as well as had to prepare my homework
Premises.P7: This taught me how to manage time efficiently and do any job quickly and effectively
Premises.P9: When my boss was out of the shop, i had to manage the accounts section of the shop
Premises.P10: From this i learned, how to manage money correctly
Premises.P11: This experience taught me, doing part time job can help students to learn many things
Premises.P12: part time job can help students earn money and which can help their parents financially
Premises.P13: By tutoring them, i earned some money and bought me books with it
Premises.P14: after taking that part time job i stopped taking my pocket money form my parents
